comment.author: 9122478@N03
comment._content: Dresser trained as a botanist, however he was producing designs for fabric, silver and wallpaper, amongst other things, by 1857.  He was also one of the first people to import Japanese goods into Britain.

comment.author: 83226190@N00
comment._content: Exhibited at "Into Africa" curated by Harry Lyons  in 2007 at the Dorman Museum, Middlesbrough.  I have a set named after the title of the exhibition which has images from the exhibition itself.
